subscriptionId.description: Identifier of the search subscription delivered by a previous "created" event.

error.description: The _error_ field contains information about the error that occurred.

status.description: The status code that indicates the cause of the error. The semantics of the used status codes are based on the [HTTP status codes](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231#section-6).

error.description:
The error code that uniquely identifies the error, e.g.,
`thing-search:subscription.protocol.error`.

message.description: A human readable message that explains in detail what went wrong.

description.description: Contains further information about the error e.g. a hint what caused the problem and how to solve it.
